add.success: Your address has been successfully added.
add.error: There was an issue adding your address, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.

edit.success: Your address has been successfully updated.
edit.error: There was an issue updating your address, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.

setAsDefault.title: Set as Default Address
setAsDefault.success: Your preferred address has been updated.
setAsDefault.error: There was an issue updating your preferred address, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.

remove.drawerHeading: Are you sure you want to delete this address?
remove.warningMessage: By deleting this address, it will be removed from your account.
remove.error: There was an issue removing your address, please try again and if you continue to have issues contact support.
